Tip-tip MRCA depths

Source: R/tipsMRCAdepths.R
tipsMRCAdepths.Rd

This function creates a matrix where columns 1 and 2 correspond to tip labels and column 3 gives the depth of the MRCA of that pair of tips. It is strongly based on treeVec and is used by relatedTreeDist and treeConcordance where tip labels belong to "categories".

tipsMRCAdepths(tree)

Arguments

tree

An object of class phylo

Examples

tree <- rtree(10)
plot(tree)

tipsMRCAdepths(tree)
#>       tip1  tip2  rootdist
#>  [1,] "t1"  "t10" "0"     
#>  [2,] "t1"  "t2"  "0"     
#>  [3,] "t1"  "t3"  "1"     
#>  [4,] "t1"  "t4"  "0"     
#>  [5,] "t1"  "t5"  "1"     
#>  [6,] "t1"  "t6"  "2"     
#>  [7,] "t1"  "t7"  "0"     
#>  [8,] "t1"  "t8"  "0"     
#>  [9,] "t1"  "t9"  "2"     
#> [10,] "t10" "t2"  "1"     
#> [11,] "t10" "t3"  "0"     
#> [12,] "t10" "t4"  "2"     
#> [13,] "t10" "t5"  "0"     
#> [14,] "t10" "t6"  "0"     
#> [15,] "t10" "t7"  "1"     
#> [16,] "t10" "t8"  "1"     
#> [17,] "t10" "t9"  "0"     
#> [18,] "t2"  "t3"  "0"     
#> [19,] "t2"  "t4"  "1"     
#> [20,] "t2"  "t5"  "0"     
#> [21,] "t2"  "t6"  "0"     
#> [22,] "t2"  "t7"  "2"     
#> [23,] "t2"  "t8"  "3"     
#> [24,] "t2"  "t9"  "0"     
#> [25,] "t3"  "t4"  "0"     
#> [26,] "t3"  "t5"  "2"     
#> [27,] "t3"  "t6"  "1"     
#> [28,] "t3"  "t7"  "0"     
#> [29,] "t3"  "t8"  "0"     
#> [30,] "t3"  "t9"  "1"     
#> [31,] "t4"  "t5"  "0"     
#> [32,] "t4"  "t6"  "0"     
#> [33,] "t4"  "t7"  "1"     
#> [34,] "t4"  "t8"  "1"     
#> [35,] "t4"  "t9"  "0"     
#> [36,] "t5"  "t6"  "1"     
#> [37,] "t5"  "t7"  "0"     
#> [38,] "t5"  "t8"  "0"     
#> [39,] "t5"  "t9"  "1"     
#> [40,] "t6"  "t7"  "0"     
#> [41,] "t6"  "t8"  "0"     
#> [42,] "t6"  "t9"  "3"     
#> [43,] "t7"  "t8"  "2"     
#> [44,] "t7"  "t9"  "0"     
#> [45,] "t8"  "t9"  "0"
